description: WinPEAS is a script that search for possible paths to escalate privileges on Windows hosts. The checks are explained on book.hacktricks.xyz
author: Georg Lauenstein (sure[secure])
name: HackTool - winPEAS Execution
query: ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"winPEAS.exe") OR (process.executable.text:("*\\winPEASany.exe" OR "*\\winPEASany_ofs.exe" OR "*\\winPEASx64.exe" OR "*\\winPEASx64_ofs.exe" OR "*\\winPEASx86.exe" OR "*\\winPEASx86_ofs.exe")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ applicationsinfo*" OR "*\ browserinfo*" OR "*\ eventsinfo*" OR "*\ fileanalysis*" OR "*\ filesinfo*" OR "*\ processinfo*" OR "*\ servicesinfo*" OR "*\ windowscreds*")) OR (process.command_line.text:"*https\:\/\/github.com\/carlospolop\/PEASS\-ng\/releases\/latest\/download\/*") OR (process.parent.command_line.text:"*\ \-linpeas") OR (process.command_line.text:"*\ \-linpeas"))
